movies.title: Crimes Against Humanity
movies.plot: After cheating on her mean boyfriend, Lewis, Brownie is hospitalized by a series of severe accidents. Instead of visiting her in the hospital, Lewis (assistant to the Dean of the local university) helps investigate two professors suspected of sleeping with students.
movies.simplePlot: After cheating on her mean boyfriend, Lewis, Brownie is hospitalized by a series of severe accidents. Instead of visiting her in the hospital, Lewis (assistant to the Dean of the local ...

biography.bio: Mike Lopez is an actor and writer, known for Crimes Against Humanity (2014), Some Girls Never Learn (2011) and Neighborhood Food Drive (2017).
biography.name: Mike Lopez

biography.bio: Lyra Hill is an actress and director, known for Uzi's Party (2014), Crimes Against Humanity (2014) and Neighborhood Food Drive (2017).
biography.name: Lyra Hill

biography.bio: Ted Tremper is a director and producer, known for Shrink (2017), Break-ups: La série (2014) and Break-ups: Die Serie (2014).
biography.name: Ted Tremper

biography.bio: Adebukola Bodunrin is a director and actor, known for Doing Good But Behaving Badly (2011), It's Hard to Wreck a Nice Beach: It's Hard to Recognize Speech (2007) and Crimes Against Humanity (2014).
biography.name: Adebukola Bodunrin

biography.bio: Adam Paul is an actor, known for Crimes Against Humanity (2014).
biography.name: Adam Paul

biography.bio: Salome Chasnoff is a director and editor, known for Turning a Corner (2006), Doin' It: Sex, Disability & Videotape (2007) and Respect Me, Don't Media Me! (2005).
biography.name: Salome Chasnoff

biography.bio: Joshua Dumas is a composer and director, known for Mirrors Are Just Water Specified (2012), Crimes Against Humanity (2014) and Red Rider's Lament (2011).
biography.name: Joshua Dumas

biography.bio: Lori Felker is a director and cinematographer, known for The Mirrored Curtain (2011), Millimeters (2008) and Future Language: The Dimensions of Von LMO (2017).
biography.name: Lori Felker

biography.bio: Tommy Heffron is an assistant director and actor, known for Land (2011), Peel (2007) and The Way of Water (2007).
biography.name: Tommy Heffron

biography.bio: Sue Klaus was born on September 27, 1953 in Harvey, Illinois, USA. She is an actress and director, known for Crimes Against Humanity (2014), Some Girls Never Learn (2011) and The Universe & Young Pilot Nelson (2008).
biography.name: Sue Klaus

biography.bio: Emily Kuehn is an actor, known for Crimes Against Humanity (2014).
biography.name: Emily Kuehn

biography.bio: Jared Larson is an actor and cinematographer, known for Some Girls Never Learn (2011), The Universe & Young Pilot Nelson (2008) and Buster's Mal Heart (2016).
biography.name: Jared Larson

biography.bio: Jb Mabe is a director and actor, known for Pastoral (2012), To Quit, to Quiet (2011) and Come Back Jack: A New Experimental Dance Film (2012).
biography.name: Jb Mabe

biography.bio: Jesse McLean is known for his work on Hamlet (2000), Two Family House (2000) and Kill by Inches (1999).
biography.name: Jesse McLean

biography.bio: Jordan Scrivner is an actor, known for Some Girls Never Learn (2011), Crimes Against Humanity (2014) and The Recognitions (2010).
biography.name: Jordan Scrivner
